2. PFD2TBT-5Per
3. PFD2TBT-10Per

The remaining two entities, "PFD2TBT-5Per" and "PFD2TBT-10Per", are clearly material names, as they include the material name "PFD2TBT" followed by a numerical suffix indicating the concentration of a certain additive.
